description: Learning to drive is a key life skill that offers independence and convenience. It requires proper training, knowledge of traffic rules, and a responsible attitude.
sentences: Enroll in a reputable driving school to learn the basics.
Thoroughly understand traffic signs, signals, and rules.
Practice regularly in different traffic conditions.
Obtaining a valid driving license is a mandatory legal requirement.
Defensive driving is about anticipating dangers and driving safely.
dos: Follow speed limits and traffic rules.
Be aware of your surroundings and check mirrors frequently.
donts: Don't use your mobile phone while driving.
Avoid road rage and aggressive driving.
Don't tailgate the vehicle in front of you.
